Package in.co.sunrays.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataUtility
    The utility class which format the data one to another
    DataValidator
    the class which validate input data enter by user
    EmailBuilder
    The class which build application email message
    EmailMessage
    The class which contain email message and setter getter
    EmailUtility
    The class which provide email services
    HTMLUtility
    Html utility provide html content like dropdownlist
    JDBCDataSource
    It is Data connection pool
    PropertyReader
    Read the property value from application
    ServletUtility
    Servletutility provide utility operation like Dropdown
